long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your passwords are the access to your data and your digital integrity, see more.
They prevent access to your data, emails etc. Manage them with your full attention. 
This extension will allow you to greatly improve your digital security.


Password :
Generate safe and secure password (4 to 100 in random of Latin characters & symbols). Corpus of up to 94 characters.
Highly configurable. 7 controls and checked against a global database of passwords known to hackers.

Passphrase of words :
Passphrases are commonly used in the crypto world. You can also use it as a basis for a very complete password.
Using a series of common words to create a passphrase is already a better idea. And even better with a powerful algorithm. This extension allow you to generate a 1 to 50 random words sequence of French (22000 words) and/or English (84000 words) words.

Check your passwords: 
Enter your passwords to check their quality.

Configuration :
You have at your disposal a number of parameters allowing you to best choose your password and/or secret phrase.
Yours preferences & settings are auto saved.

   -Launch : Start password or passphrase. Your preferences are stored in local vairables on your computer (default option).
   -password : precise selection of the content of your corpus. 
     (Password generation is based on this corpus).
   -Choose the controls and analysis to apply to each password.
   -Passphrase : Choose the different parameters to generate your passphrase (number of words, separator etc.).

   -Theme : You have the choice between 17 varied themes. Adapt the colors of the interface according to your preferences. 
   -Language : 48 languages including language written from right to left.
 
Security :
This extension does not store or memorize generated passwords and passphrases.
No information is tracked or sent over the internet.
Used a 128 bits of cryptographic quality random data (window.crypto.getRandomValues). 
Checked against a global database of passwords known to hackers. It is not transmitted over the network, only the first 5 characters (in hash form) are transmitted. 

The extension works in both online and offline mode.

Try it and give your opinion !
Thanks a lot.
